author: sf1378
title: first Technic
review:
My first Technic set too...My parents gave it to me New Years Day 87 or 88. Odd thing was my figure had black arms not blue! Did anyone else have one like that? as a kid it was hard to build at the time but I liked the rack and pinion steering. I kept rebuilding the other optional models but without the motor as I didn't have that. Lost a lot of the parts now as I also tried using normal Lego to turn it into a rally car for the figure like a Peugeot hatchback...

It led to my getting the following Xmas the chopper, 3 pack of figures and the Snow Ranger the following year!
